name: Divider

props.name: lineColor
props.description: Explicit color; defaults to theme text colour against background.

props.name: thickness
props.description: Thickness of the line; number uses theme.stroke(n), string passes through.

props.name: length
props.description: Length along the main axis; number ⇒ px, string passes through.

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

props.name: pad
props.description: Container padding as units or CSS length.

props.name: compact
props.description: Compact mode zeros gap and pad where supported.

bestPractices: Use to separate related groups; avoid overuse that creates visual noise.
Prefer semantic spacing first; add dividers only when separation isn’t clear.
Match thickness and colour to theme density; avoid heavy borders in content‑dense areas.
Respect alignment—span appropriate containers and avoid awkward trims.
Don’t communicate state with dividers; use colour/tokens in the relevant component instead.
